snippet: You can’t understand sexual violence in India without understanding caste.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Amana Fontanella-Khan, citing rape and hanging of two girls in utter Pradesh, India, urges examination of the role caste system plays in sexual violence in India; laments crimes against those of lower caste, often in rural areas, are routinely ignored; asserts caste-based system of violence emerges out of feudal sense of entitlement among upper-caste men.
lead_paragraph: You can’t understand sexual violence in India without understanding caste.
